comment: The Axiom of Extensionality ( ~ ax-ext ) restated so that it postulates the existence of a set ` z ` given two arbitrary sets ` x ` and ` y ` . This way to express it follows the general idea of the other ZFC axioms, which is to postulate the existence of sets given other sets. (Contributed by NM, 28-Sep-2003.)
